original_text: A husband has authority over his wife, in the same way that Christ has authority over the church. The church is like Christ's body. As its head, he saves her.
korean_text: 이는 남편이 아내의 머리 됨이 그리스도께서 교회의 머리 됨과 같음이니 그가 바로 몸의 구주시니라

sentences.original_text: A husband has authority over his wife
in the same way that Christ has authority over the church
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도가 교회에 대한 권위를 가지는 것과 같은 방식으로

sentences.original_text: The church is like Christ's body
